title: Plan for Seasonal Hiring
description: A retail company needs to plan its seasonal hiring for the upcoming holiday season.

tasks.description: Analyze historical sales and staffing data from previous holiday seasons to forecast hiring needs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst forecasts a need for 200 seasonal employees.

tasks.description: Develop a hiring plan, including a timeline, sourcing strategy, and budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: The workforce planning team creates a comprehensive plan for seasonal hiring.

tasks.description: Present the plan to leadership for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team gets approval from leadership to execute the hiring plan.
